pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate Gaussian Mixture Vector Autoregressive Model // Unconstrained and constrained maximum likelihood estimation of structural and reduced form Gaussian mixture vector autoregressive (GMVAR) model, quantile residual tests, graphical diagnostics, simulations, forecasting, and estimation of generalized impulse response function and generalized forecast error variance decomposition. Leena Kalliovirta, Mika Meitz, Pentti Saikkonen (2016) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2016.02.012, Savi Virolainen (2020) arXiv:2007.04713.
